forms.name: SPICe+ (INC-32)
forms.description: Used for company incorporation and application for PAN, TAN, and DIN in one go.

forms.name: AGILE-PRO (INC-35)
forms.description: Used to register for GST, EPFO, ESIC, Profession Tax (in some states), and open a bank account during incorporation.

forms.name: Post-Incorporation Filings (MGT-7, AOC-4)
forms.description: Annual filings required after company incorporation for financial and compliance reporting.

forms.name: Corporate Identity Number (CIN)
forms.description: Unique identification number assigned to companies upon incorporation in India.

forms.name: Startup Recognition Form
forms.description: Get recognized as a startup by DPIIT to avail tax exemptions, easier IPR access, and government schemes.

forms.name: Form 80-IAC
forms.description: Used to claim income tax exemption under Section 80-IAC for three years after DPIIT recognition.

forms.name: Form 56
forms.description: Used to apply for Angel Tax exemption under Section 56(2)(viib).

forms.name: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme Application
forms.description: Optional form for applying to government seed funding for DPIIT-recognized startups.

forms.name: Udyam Registration
forms.description: Register your business as a Micro, Small, or Medium Enterprise (MSME) to access government benefits and funding.

forms.name: GST REG-01
forms.description: Required for businesses with turnover above â‚¹20 lakh or those doing inter-state supply of goods/services.

forms.name: Shram Suvidha Portal
forms.description: Used to register for LIN (Labor Identification Number) and comply with labor laws.

forms.name: EPFO Registration
forms.description: Register your company for Employee Provident Fund obligations.

forms.name: ESIC Registration
forms.description: Register your company with Employee State Insurance Corporation for employee health benefits.

forms.name: Shop & Establishment License
forms.description: Register your physical office/shop with the local municipal authority.

forms.name: Professional Tax Enrollment Certificate (PTEC)
forms.description: Separate from PTRC, needed by self-employed professionals or directors.

forms.name: FSSAI Registration
forms.description: License required for any startup involved in the food business.

forms.name: Import Export Code (IEC)
forms.description: Required for businesses engaged in import/export operations.

forms.name: Trademark / Patent Registration
forms.description: Register your brand or innovation to protect intellectual property.

forms.name: Drug License
forms.description: Compulsory for pharmaceutical startups to sell or manufacture drugs.

forms.name: Legal Metrology Registration
forms.description: Required for businesses dealing with packaged goods to ensure accurate weight & measurement labeling.

forms.name: Fire Department NOC
forms.description: Mandatory for commercial buildings, factories, and public spaces to comply with fire safety norms.

forms.name: OSP License
forms.description: Mandatory for IT/ITES and BPOs using telecom infrastructure for customer support or data processing.

forms.name: STPI / SEZ Unit Approval
forms.description: Required for IT exports operating under Software Technology Parks or SEZ schemes.

forms.name: E-Waste / Plastic Waste Management Registration
forms.description: Mandatory for electronic manufacturers or plastic packaging businesses.

forms.name: Vehicle Fitness Certificate / RC
forms.description: For businesses operating delivery fleets, transport vehicles, etc.

forms.name: Contract Labour Registration (CLRA)
forms.description: Mandatory for contractors employing 20+ workers.

forms.name: Import Export Declaration
forms.description: Declaration form required alongside IEC for international trade operations.

forms.name: Certificate of Commencement of Business
forms.description: Mandatory for companies to start operations post-incorporation (filed via MCA).

forms.name: Startup Self-Certification
forms.description: Optional self-compliance form for Startups under 9 labor and 3 environmental laws.

forms.name: Digital Signature Certificate (Class 3)
forms.description: Useful for secure digital document signing; required for many official filings.

forms.name: ISO Certification Application
forms.description: Optional international standard certification to improve product/service quality.

optional.title: Startup Loan Scheme Application (MUDRA / Stand-Up India)

forms.name: Stand-Up India or MUDRA Loan
forms.description: Government-backed loan schemes for startups under priority sectors.

forms.name: Startup India Learning Certificate
forms.description: Free online course to help entrepreneurs build, scale, and pitch startups.

forms.name: NSIC Registration Form
forms.description: Optional MSME registration for public procurement and tendering benefits.

optional.title: Pitch Deck Submission to Invest India

forms.name: Pitch Deck / Business Plan Upload
forms.description: Optional form for visibility to government investors and startup support programs.

forms.name: FDI Proposal Form
forms.description: Required only if your business falls under the government approval route for FDI.
